column5: wow what a day yesterday weather was perfect. 10 hrs on the water countless fish in the boat. my father in law who can't fish much any more due to health reasons came by had caught a least 30 fish in 2 hrs or so on a drop shot rig made his day to catch them like that.  i caught my pb just a hair under the 5 pound mark
that picture really sucks but it really was that big lol. didnt have time to take any better pics i was exhausted by that point of the day
You're obviously a better Angler than a Photographer!
Yup.Sounds like the fall is here and the fish are putting on the feedbag! Great report and thanks for sharing.
blame the wife she took it
Nice bass archer379    congrats Thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice bass.....not a word about the picture since your wife took it  lol
